instructions: This demos will first ask you to select a preferred language and then walk through using all of the built-in prompts in that language.
locale_updated: Your preferred language is now sourashtra.
locale_updated_ssml: Your preferred language is now palkar.
text_prompt: Prompts.text(): enter some texts and it will be repeated back to you.
number_prompt: Prompts.number(): enter a number. Try something not a number to see the built-in re-prompt text.
listStyle_prompt: Prompts.choice() supports a range of ListStyles. Which would you like to use?
time_prompt: Prompts.time(): the built-in time prompt only accepts english. Enter a time like 'monday at 7am' and I'll show you the JSON returned.
demo_finished: That's the end of the demo.
